groups.label: Overview
groups.html:
Value Engines - VE-MIP

MIP - Managed Intelligent Provider Services

New Era IT's current revenue foundation. MIP turns every IT event, service request, and infrastructure alert into a structured Fact - context added, asset linked, resolution routed through the Agentic Factory. Four engines govern how MIP wins clients, delivers services, improves its product, and manages physical infrastructure.

groups.label: Four-Engine Operating Model
groups.html:
?
Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
?
Growth Engine
How MIP acquires and expands clients

MIP Growth converts market presence into recurring MRR. The engine runs three tiers - Trial ($2-4k), Standard ($4-8k), Strategic ($8-15k) - with each tier designed to demonstrate value fast and create natural expansion paths upward. Growth is not just new logos; it is expanding wallet share within existing accounts as each new Mini-OS domain is activated.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Sales OS Marketing OS Strategy OS
Proprietary Streams
MIP Trial Onboarding Stream
New client enrolled at Trial tier ? RMM agent deployed ? first monitoring dashboard live within 48 hours ? value demonstrated before invoice 2
MIP Baseline Intake Stream
Client onboarding started ? Microsoft, website, domain, network, Wi-Fi, ISP, and camera baseline captured as Facts ? data validated and normalized in Dataverse ? onboarding baseline complete for delivery handoff (no AI path)
MIP Tier Expansion Stream
Triggered when client hits Usage Threshold Fact ? Growth Genie identifies expansion opportunity ? proposal generated ? tier upgrade executed
MIP Renewal Stream
90 days before contract end ? health score pulled ? renewal proposal drafted ? human account lead reviews ? renewal executed or churn risk escalated
Specialist Genies
MIP Growth Genie
Monitors client usage patterns and identifies upsell and cross-sell signals. Triggers when a client's fact volume, ticket complexity, or infrastructure footprint indicates readiness for the next tier or an additional Mini-OS domain.
MIP Proposal Genie
Generates tier upgrade and expansion proposals pre-populated with client-specific ROI data from the Digital Twin - hours saved, incidents auto-resolved, SLA compliance improvement since onboarding.
?
Fulfillment Engine
How MIP delivers on its service promises

MIP Fulfillment is the operational engine behind every SLA. Every ticket, alert, and incident is a Fact that enters the LiveOpsOS loop: enriched with priority, client context, and resolution history, routed to the right worker type, resolved or escalated, and logged. The Digital Twin maintains full resolution history - every client interaction traceable, every SLA measurable in real time.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Services OS Operations OS Productivity OS
Proprietary Streams
MIP Ticket Resolution Stream
Alert or ticket Fact enters loop ? enriched with client tier, asset context, SLA ? auto-remediation attempted ? if unresolved, routed to human with full context assembled ? resolved ? Digital Twin updated
MIP SLA Compliance Stream
Continuous monitoring of all active SLAs ? SLA Alert Genie fires at threshold ? escalation routing ? monthly SLA compliance report per client
MIP Client Health Stream
Weekly aggregation of ticket volume, resolution time, auto-remediation rate, and satisfaction signals ? health score updated ? at-risk clients flagged to account lead
Specialist Genies
MIP Triage Genie
First agent in the resolution loop. Classifies every incoming Fact by type, urgency, and likely resolution path. Routes: auto-remediation for known patterns, human escalation for novel or high-risk events.
MIP Remediation Genie
Executes auto-remediation actions for known issue patterns - password resets, patch deployment, service restarts, disk cleanup - via RMM integration. Logs every action as a Fact with full audit trail.
MIP Report Genie
Generates monthly client service reports: ticket volume, resolution time, auto-resolution rate, SLA compliance, and system health summary. Personalised per client, distributed automatically.
?
Innovation Engine
How MIP improves its own product and service delivery

MIP Innovation uses the fact stream generated by its own Fulfillment Engine to continuously improve. Every auto-remediation pattern, every repeat ticket type, every SLA near-breach is signal. The Innovation Engine processes this signal through LEAN OS and Innovation OS to produce new Genies, improved resolution playbooks, and better client outcomes over time - compounding the Workforce Maturity rate.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Innovation OS LEAN OS Product OS
Proprietary Streams
MIP Agent Improvement Stream
Monthly: pull repeat ticket patterns from Digital Twin ? identify candidates for new auto-remediation Genies ? AI Studio builds and tests ? deployed to production ? workforce maturity rate updated
MIP Playbook Update Stream
Triggered when resolution pattern changes or a new issue type exceeds frequency threshold ? existing playbook reviewed ? Genie updated or new Genie commissioned from AI Studio
Specialist Genies
MIP Pattern Analysis Genie
Monthly analysis of the Digital Twin's resolution history. Identifies the top 10 recurring ticket types not yet auto-resolved, estimates effort-to-automate, and produces a prioritised backlog for AI Studio to build.
MIP LEAN Genie
Applies LEAN OS waste analysis to MIP delivery workflows. Identifies where human time is spent on work that could be automated, where hand-offs cause delay, and where SLA risk concentrates.
?
Logistics Engine
How MIP manages physical IT infrastructure and field delivery

MIP Logistics covers the physical layer of IT service delivery - hardware procurement, device dispatch, field technician coordination, and on-site support. Every hardware order, site visit, and device lifecycle event is a Fact. The Logistics Engine ensures the right equipment is in the right place at the right time, with full traceability from order to installation to retirement.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Admin OS Operations OS
Proprietary Streams
MIP Hardware Order Stream
Hardware request raised ? supplier API checked (Leader/Ingram) ? PO generated ? shipment tracked ? delivery_confirmed Fact ? device provisioned ? Digital Asset created
MIP Field Dispatch Stream
On-site requirement identified ? technician scheduled ? work order created ? site visit executed ? resolution logged ? client sign-off ? Digital Twin updated
MIP Device Lifecycle Stream
Device approaching end-of-life threshold ? replacement flagged ? Hardware Order Stream triggered ? old device decommissioned ? asset record archived
Specialist Genies
MIP Procurement Genie
Generates hardware purchase orders pre-populated from client asset records. Selects from approved supplier list, applies Finance OS Profit First pricing rules, routes for approval based on value threshold.
MIP Field Scheduling Genie
Coordinates field technician dispatch - matches skills to job requirements, checks availability, calculates travel time, generates job sheet with full client context from the Digital Twin.
groups.purpose: MIP Growth converts market presence into recurring MRR. The engine runs three tiers - Trial ($2-4k), Standard ($4-8k), Strategic ($8-15k) - with each tier designed to demonstrate value fast and create natural expansion paths upward. Growth is not just new logos; it is expanding wallet share within existing accounts as each new Mini-OS domain is activated.
groups.callout: Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.

groups.label: Overview
groups.html:
Value Engines - VE-AISTUDIO

AI Studio - Platform Development & Agent Engineering

The engineering factory behind every LiveOpsOS deployment. AI Studio builds and maintains the Mini-OS domains, specialist Genies, and deployment pipelines that make all other pillars possible. Its four engines govern how AI Studio wins engagements, delivers builds, improves its platform, and manages its build operations.
groups.purpose: AI Studio - Platform Development & Agent Engineering

groups.label: Four-Engine Operating Model
groups.html:
?
Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
?
Growth Engine
How AI Studio wins engineering engagements

AI Studio Growth sells engineering capability - the ability to build, deploy, and maintain LiveOpsOS implementations at speed. Engagements begin when a client or internal pillar needs a new Mini-OS domain, a Genie built, or an existing system extended. Growth also covers the commercial model for licensing LiveOpsOS to other service providers and PE portfolio companies.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Sales OS Strategy OS Marketing OS
Proprietary Streams
AI Studio Scoping Stream
Engagement enquiry received ? requirements captured ? AI Studio Scoping Genie produces build estimate ? proposal generated ? SOW executed ? build initiated
AI Studio Pipeline Stream
Monthly review of internal build backlog and external engagement pipeline ? capacity matched to demand ? prioritization decisions logged ? roadmap updated
Specialist Genies
AI Studio Scoping Genie
Takes a Mini-OS or Genie build brief and produces a structured estimate: complexity assessment, Codex 5.3 scaffold time, Opus 4.6 orchestration requirements, testing scope, and deployment timeline. Used for both internal builds and external client proposals.
AI Studio Growth Genie
Monitors deployment patterns across all active client engagements to identify expansion signals - domains not yet activated, Genie gaps, integration opportunities - and surfaces them to the account lead as qualified opportunities.
?
Fulfillment Engine
How AI Studio delivers builds

AI Studio Fulfillment is the engineering delivery engine. Every build - whether a new Mini-OS domain, a specialist Genie, or a Stream - follows a governed process: scoped, scaffolded via Codex 5.3, orchestration tuned with Opus 4.6, tested against the Digital Twin, deployed, and handed over with documentation. Every build is a traceable artifact in the Digital Twin.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Product OS Operations OS LEAN OS
Proprietary Streams
Mini-OS Build Stream
SOW confirmed ? Codex 5.3 scaffolds agent system ? Genie logic built ? Stream process defined ? tested against Digital Twin sandbox ? deployed to client environment ? documentation generated ? handover logged
Genie Deployment Stream
Genie commissioned ? prompt engineered ? tool bindings configured ? tested against real fact patterns ? approved ? deployed via Foundry ? monitoring configured ? Genie Digital Asset created
AI Studio QA Stream
Every build goes through QA: Fact input validation, Genie output accuracy testing, Stream end-to-end flow verification, Digital Twin write confirmation - pass/fail logged ? remediation if needed ? sign-off recorded
Specialist Genies
Build Scaffold Genie
Uses Codex 5.3 to generate the initial agent system scaffold for a new Mini-OS domain or Genie. Produces the base structure, tool bindings, and Fact schema - collapsing multi-week manual builds into governed, repeatable sessions.
QA Genie
Runs automated quality checks against every build: validates Fact schema completeness, tests Genie outputs against edge cases, verifies Stream step sequencing, and confirms Digital Twin write integrity.
Documentation Genie
Generates build documentation from the completed agent system: Fact types, Digital Asset schema, System definitions, Genie trigger specifications, Stream process flows, and tool mappings. Produces handover-ready output.
?
Innovation Engine
How AI Studio advances the platform

AI Studio Innovation is where the platform itself improves. New model capabilities (Codex, Opus, future releases), new Microsoft platform features (Fabric, Foundry, Copilot Studio updates), and patterns learned from client deployments all feed into a continuous improvement loop. The Innovation Engine ensures LiveOpsOS stays ahead of the market.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Innovation OS Product OS LEAN OS
Proprietary Streams
Platform Capability Review Stream
Monthly: review new AI model releases and Microsoft platform updates ? assess integration opportunities ? build proof-of-concept ? evaluate against current architecture ? adoption decision logged
AI Studio R&D Stream
Experimental builds - new Genie patterns, novel Stream architectures, multi-agent coordination approaches - run in isolated Digital Twin sandbox ? evaluated ? promoted to platform standard if validated
Specialist Genies
Platform Intelligence Genie
Monitors AI model release notes, Azure updates, and Copilot Studio changes. Surfaces capabilities relevant to existing LiveOpsOS components and flags potential breaking changes requiring remediation.
Pattern Library Genie
Extracts reusable patterns from completed builds - Genie structures, Stream flows, Fact schemas that appear across multiple deployments - and adds them to the AI Studio pattern library for future scaffold acceleration.
?
Logistics Engine
How AI Studio manages its build operations

AI Studio Logistics covers the operational infrastructure of the engineering team - compute resource allocation, model API access management, build environment provisioning, and the coordination of human engineers with Digital Workers. Every compute spend, API call budget, and environment provisioning event is a Fact tracked for cost management and capacity planning.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Admin OS Finance OS Operations OS
Proprietary Streams
AI Studio Resource Stream
Monthly compute and API spend review ? actual vs budget per project ? overage alerts ? resource reallocation decisions ? Finance OS updated
Environment Provisioning Stream
New build commissioned ? Azure environment provisioned ? Foundry workspace created ? access granted ? environment Digital Asset created ? costs tracked from day one
Specialist Genies
Resource Cost Genie
Monitors Azure and AI API spend per build project against Finance OS budget allocations. Flags overages, identifies inefficiencies (idle environments, oversized instances), and produces cost-per-build metrics for pricing validation.
Capacity Genie
Tracks engineering team capacity against the build backlog. Identifies bottlenecks, models delivery timelines, and flags capacity gaps requiring contractor or automation decisions.
groups.purpose: AI Studio Growth sells engineering capability - the ability to build, deploy, and maintain LiveOpsOS implementations at speed. Engagements begin when a client or internal pillar needs a new Mini-OS domain, a Genie built, or an existing system extended. Growth also covers the commercial model for licensing LiveOpsOS to other service providers and PE portfolio companies.
groups.callout: Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.

groups.label: Overview
groups.html:
Value Engines - VE-LIVEOPS

LiveOps - Real-Time Command Center & Back-of-House Operations

The operational backbone most clients don't see until they need it. LiveOps runs the real-time command center - live view of incoming Facts, active situations, asset status, and workflow health - while managing the back-of-house human layer: call centers, support desks, security operations, incident response, and compliance teams. Once a client's operations run through LiveOps, switching cost is near-zero to add any new Mini-OS domain.
groups.purpose: LiveOps - Real-Time Command Center & Back-of-House Operations

groups.label: Four-Engine Operating Model
groups.html:
?
Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
?
Growth Engine
How LiveOps wins command center and operations engagements

LiveOps Growth targets clients whose operational complexity has outgrown their current coordination model - too many systems, too many hand-offs, too much context lost between teams. The commercial model is an operations outsourcing engagement: New Era runs the command center, the back-of-house team, or both. Entry is typically through an existing MIP relationship where the client has already seen the LiveOpsOS loop working and wants it extended to their broader operations.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Sales OS Strategy OS Services OS
Proprietary Streams
LiveOps Assessment Stream
Client operational audit ? command center gap analysis ? back-of-house scope defined ? LiveOps Scoping Genie produces engagement proposal ? SOW executed ? command center provisioned
LiveOps Expansion Stream
Triggered when client activates new Mini-OS domain ? LiveOps Expansion Genie assesses integration requirements ? command center updated ? new Fact types onboarded ? coverage expanded
Specialist Genies
LiveOps Scoping Genie
Takes a client's operational profile - current tools, team structure, incident volume, escalation patterns - and produces a LiveOps engagement design: command center configuration, back-of-house staffing model, Mini-OS integration sequence, and commercial proposal.
LiveOps Value Genie
Generates ROI evidence from the Digital Twin - incidents resolved faster, escalations reduced, context-loss eliminated - for renewal conversations and expansion proposals. Makes the invisible coordination work visible and quantified.
?
Fulfillment Engine
How LiveOps runs command center and back-of-house operations

LiveOps Fulfillment is the live operational engine. The command center receives every Fact from every active Mini-OS in real time - incidents, approvals, escalations, capacity alerts, SLA risks - and coordinates the human and Digital Worker response. The back-of-house layer handles what Digital Workers cannot: judgment calls, client relationships, compliance decisions, and exception management. The Digital Twin replay capability means any situation can be reconstructed, reviewed, and tested against alternative responses.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Operations OS Services OS HR OS Productivity OS
Proprietary Streams
Command Center Live Stream
Continuous: all active Mini-OS Fact streams aggregate to command center ? Situation Genie classifies and prioritises ? Digital Worker handles routine ? Hybrid Worker handles judgment calls ? Human escalation for exceptions ? every decision logged
Back-of-House Coordination Stream
Shift starts ? team briefed via Daily Ops Brief Genie ? active situations assigned ? escalations managed ? shift closes ? performance metrics logged ? Digital Twin updated with full shift record
Incident Command Stream
High-severity incident Fact detected ? Incident Command Genie assembles context from Digital Twin ? situation room activated ? response coordinated across Mini-OS ? resolution confirmed ? full incident record preserved
Digital Twin Replay Stream
On-demand: any past situation replayed from Digital Twin ? alternative response modeled ? outcome compared ? learnings extracted ? playbook updated ? improvement logged to Innovation Engine
Specialist Genies
Situation Genie
The primary command center agent. Receives all incoming Facts, classifies by type and urgency, determines routing (auto-resolve, Hybrid Worker, Human escalation), assembles context from the Digital Twin, and surfaces the situation to the right person with everything they need already in front of them.
Incident Command Genie
Activated on high-severity situations. Pulls full context from Digital Twin, identifies all affected assets and systems, assembles the response team, tracks actions in real time, and produces the post-incident report with root cause and recommendations.
Daily Ops Brief Genie
Generates the start-of-shift operations brief for every back-of-house team: active situations, pending escalations, SLA risks, capacity status, and priority actions for the shift. Replaces manual morning standup preparation.
?
Innovation Engine
How LiveOps improves human-Digital Worker collaboration

LiveOps Innovation uses the command center's own operational record to continuously improve. Every situation handled, every escalation pattern, every resolution time is signal. The Innovation Engine processes this through LEAN OS and Innovation OS to produce better routing logic, faster Genie responses, improved escalation playbooks, and a rising auto-resolution rate - shifting more work from Human to Hybrid to Digital Worker over time.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Innovation OS LEAN OS HR OS
Proprietary Streams
LiveOps Automation Uplift Stream
Monthly: analyze command center Digital Twin ? identify top 10 situation types still requiring human judgment ? assess automation feasibility ? commission AI Studio for new Genies ? deploy ? measure auto-resolution rate change
LiveOps Playbook Review Stream
Quarterly: review all escalation patterns and resolution outcomes ? identify where playbooks diverge from best practice ? update routing rules ? retrain relevant Genies ? changes tested in Digital Twin sandbox before production deployment
Specialist Genies
LiveOps Pattern Genie
Analyzes the command center Digital Twin to identify situation types where human response is consistent and predictable - strong candidates for Genie automation. Produces a ranked automation backlog for AI Studio.
LiveOps LEAN Genie
Applies LEAN OS waste analysis to command center workflows. Identifies where hand-offs cause delay, where context is lost between workers, where escalations are unnecessary, and where cycle time can be reduced without increasing risk.
?
Logistics Engine
How LiveOps manages its human workforce and shift operations

LiveOps Logistics is the operational infrastructure of the human layer - shift scheduling, rostering, workforce capacity planning, and performance management for the back-of-house team. Every shift, every staffing decision, and every capacity event is a Fact. The Logistics Engine ensures the right people are available at the right time to handle whatever the command center surfaces.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
HR OS Admin OS Finance OS
Proprietary Streams
LiveOps Rostering Stream
Weekly: demand forecast from command center Fact volume patterns ? Rostering Genie generates shift schedule ? human operations manager approves ? schedule published ? shift confirmations logged ? Digital Twin updated
LiveOps Capacity Stream
Continuous: real-time monitoring of command center queue depth vs available staff ? capacity threshold Fact if queue builds ? Surge Genie activates ? additional coverage arranged ? Finance OS updated with overtime costs
LiveOps Performance Stream
Monthly: pull individual and team performance metrics from Digital Twin ? resolution times, escalation rates, quality scores ? human manager review ? coaching actions logged ? performance Digital Assets updated
Specialist Genies
Rostering Genie
Generates the back-of-house shift schedule based on historical Fact volume patterns, current staff availability, skill requirements, and Finance OS budget constraints. Optimizes coverage while minimising overtime cost.
Surge Genie
Activated when command center queue depth exceeds threshold. Identifies available additional coverage options (overtime, on-call, contractor), calculates cost, and presents options to the operations manager for rapid decision.
groups.purpose: LiveOps Growth targets clients whose operational complexity has outgrown their current coordination model - too many systems, too many hand-offs, too much context lost between teams. The commercial model is an operations outsourcing engagement: New Era runs the command center, the back-of-house team, or both. Entry is typically through an existing MIP relationship where the client has already seen the LiveOpsOS loop working and wants it extended to their broader operations.
groups.callout: Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.

groups.label: Overview
groups.html:
Value Engines - VE-IB

Intelligent Buildings + Robotics & Physical Operations

LiveOpsOS extended into the physical world. Sensors, devices, robots, and building management systems generate Facts - temperature spikes, equipment faults, energy anomalies, inventory movements. Intelligent Buildings applies the same loop to physical reality: context added, assets linked, response decided, action executed. Four engines govern how this pillar grows, delivers, improves, and operates.

groups.label: Four-Engine Operating Model
groups.html:
?
Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
?
Growth Engine
How Intelligent Buildings wins physical operations engagements

Intelligent Buildings Growth targets industries pure digital cannot serve - warehousing, logistics, manufacturing, facilities management, and commercial real estate. The commercial model is a Value Engine implementation ($60-100k) layered onto an existing MIP or LiveOps engagement. Growth starts with a single building or facility and expands as ROI is demonstrated: energy savings, maintenance cost reduction, and automation gains make the case.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Sales OS Strategy OS Marketing OS
Proprietary Streams
IB Site Assessment Stream
Prospect engaged ? site assessment scheduled ? sensor and device audit ? Digital Twin gap analysis ? IB Scoping Genie produces implementation proposal ? SOW executed
IB Pilot-to-Production Stream
Pilot site activated ? 30-day performance baseline established ? ROI calculated ? expansion proposal generated ? additional sites onboarded
Specialist Genies
IB Scoping Genie
Takes a site profile (building type, device inventory, current automation level) and produces an Intelligent Buildings implementation estimate: sensor deployment plan, integration architecture, expected automation outcomes, and commercial proposal.
IB ROI Genie
Generates client-facing ROI reports from the Digital Twin - energy cost reduction, maintenance incidents avoided, automation hours saved - updated monthly to support renewal and expansion conversations.
?
Fulfillment Engine
How Intelligent Buildings delivers physical automation outcomes

Every physical event - door opened, HVAC threshold crossed, equipment fault detected, robot position reported - enters LiveOpsOS as a Fact. The Fulfillment Engine ensures the right response happens: HVAC adjusted, maintenance dispatched, robot rerouted, security alerted. The Digital Twin maintains a complete physical history - every sensor reading, every automated action, every intervention traceable.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Operations OS Manufacturing OS Services OS
Proprietary Streams
IB Alert Response Stream
Physical alert Fact enters loop ? enriched with asset, location, threshold ? auto-response executed (HVAC adjustment, lighting control, robot command) ? if unresolved, human technician dispatched ? resolution logged
IB Maintenance Dispatch Stream
Predictive maintenance threshold crossed ? maintenance_required Fact generated ? technician scheduled via Field Services ? work order created ? repair confirmed ? asset health updated in Digital Twin
IB Energy Optimization Stream
Continuous: occupancy and environmental sensor Facts ? AI optimization model ? HVAC, lighting, and power commands issued ? energy consumption logged ? monthly savings report generated
Specialist Genies
IB Automation Genie
Receives physical alert Facts and determines the optimal automated response based on asset type, location, time of day, and occupancy context. Issues commands to building management systems via API integration.
IB Maintenance Genie
Analyzes equipment sensor data patterns against maintenance thresholds. Identifies emerging faults before failure, generates maintenance work orders with full asset history, and prioritises dispatch based on criticality.
IB Energy Genie
Continuously optimizes energy consumption by analysing occupancy patterns, weather data, and current consumption against targets. Issues BMS commands to reduce waste while maintaining comfort thresholds.
?
Innovation Engine
How Intelligent Buildings advances its automation capability

Intelligent Buildings Innovation adds new device categories, sensor types, robotics integrations, and automation patterns over time. Every client deployment teaches the system something - new failure patterns, new optimization opportunities, new integration patterns with BMS platforms. The Innovation Engine processes this learning into platform improvements deployed across all sites.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Innovation OS LEAN OS Product OS
Proprietary Streams
IB Pattern Learning Stream
Monthly: extract anomaly and resolution patterns from all active site Digital Twins ? identify automation candidates not yet covered ? commission AI Studio to build new IB Genies ? deploy across fleet
IB Robotics Integration Stream
New robotics partnership or hardware category identified ? integration architecture designed ? Azure IoT Hub connection built ? tested in sandbox ? deployed to qualifying sites
Specialist Genies
IB Pattern Genie
Analyzes the full fleet of site Digital Twins to identify automation patterns appearing across multiple sites. Produces a ranked list of new Genie candidates ordered by impact and generalisability.
IB Benchmark Genie
Compares performance metrics across all active IB sites - energy efficiency, maintenance frequency, automation coverage - and surfaces outliers: both best practice cases to replicate and underperformers requiring attention.
?
Logistics Engine
How Intelligent Buildings manages hardware, sensors, and field operations

Intelligent Buildings Logistics covers the physical supply chain of the pillar itself - sensor procurement, hardware installation, device lifecycle management, and field technician coordination across all active sites. Every device order, installation event, and hardware retirement is a Fact. The Logistics Engine ensures devices are live, calibrated, and replaced before they fail.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Admin OS Operations OS Manufacturing OS
Proprietary Streams
IB Device Deployment Stream
New site onboarded ? device bill-of-materials confirmed ? hardware ordered via MIP Logistics Engine ? installation scheduled ? devices commissioned ? IoT Hub registration ? Digital Assets created ? monitoring live
IB Device Lifecycle Stream
Device health monitoring continuous ? degradation threshold ? replacement order triggered ? field technician dispatched ? device swapped ? old asset archived ? new asset registered
IB Site Audit Stream
Quarterly: full device inventory audit per site ? compare against Digital Asset registry ? flag discrepancies ? calibration checks ? firmware update sweep ? audit report generated
Specialist Genies
IB Device Genie
Monitors all device Digital Assets for health, calibration drift, firmware version, and connectivity status. Surfaces devices requiring attention before they cause service degradation or data gaps.
IB Install Genie
Generates installation work orders for new device deployments - device type, mounting location, wiring requirements, commissioning steps, IoT Hub registration procedure - pre-populated from the site Digital Twin.
groups.purpose: Intelligent Buildings Growth targets industries pure digital cannot serve - warehousing, logistics, manufacturing, facilities management, and commercial real estate. The commercial model is a Value Engine implementation ($60-100k) layered onto an existing MIP or LiveOps engagement. Growth starts with a single building or facility and expands as ROI is demonstrated: energy savings, maintenance cost reduction, and automation gains make the case.
groups.callout: Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.

groups.label: Overview
groups.html:
Value Engines - VE-RTBI

LiveOpsOS Intelligence - Analytics, Planning & Foresight

The highest-value unlock in the LiveOpsOS stack. RTBI turns the continuous Fact stream from all active pillars into real-time dashboards, anomaly detection, KPI tracking, and predictive foresight - with no ETL delays and no data silos. Four engines govern how RTBI is sold, delivered, improved, and operated.

groups.label: Four-Engine Operating Model
groups.html:
?
Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
?
Growth Engine
How RTBI is sold as a strategic asset

RTBI Growth converts operational clients into intelligence clients. The engine activates when a client already running MIP, LiveOps, or Intelligent Buildings has sufficient Fact volume to make RTBI meaningful - typically after 90 days of Fact accumulation. The commercial model is an intelligence layer add-on ($3-8k/month) that transforms operational data into board-level strategic visibility. The client stops asking 'what happened?' and starts asking 'what should we do next?'

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Sales OS Strategy OS Marketing OS
Proprietary Streams
RTBI Readiness Stream
Client Fact volume threshold crossed ? RTBI Readiness Genie assesses data quality and coverage ? readiness report produced ? RTBI proposal generated ? commercial conversation initiated
RTBI Onboarding Stream
RTBI engagement confirmed ? Unified Data layer configured ? Power BI dashboards provisioned ? Digital Twin validated ? Analytics live ? Planning models calibrated ? client trained
Specialist Genies
RTBI Readiness Genie
Assesses a client's Fact stream for RTBI readiness: data completeness, Fact volume consistency, Digital Asset coverage, and Digital Twin integrity. Produces a readiness score and gap analysis for the sales conversation.
RTBI Value Genie
Generates RTBI business case proposals using the client's own operational data - anomalies that would have been caught earlier, decisions that could have been made faster, efficiency gains visible only through pattern analysis. Makes the invisible visible.
?
Fulfillment Engine
How RTBI delivers intelligence outcomes

RTBI Fulfillment is the operational delivery of all five intelligence components: Unified Data flowing in real time, Digital Twin maintaining complete history, Analytics surfacing live KPIs, Planning projecting forward from real data, and Decisions prescribing what to do next. Every dashboard, every anomaly alert, every forecast, and every recommendation is a deliverable from the Fulfillment Engine - with full traceability back to the Facts that generated it.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Operations OS Finance OS Services OS
Proprietary Streams
RTBI Analytics Stream
Continuous: Facts from all active Mini-OS flow to Unified Data ? Power BI dashboards update in real time ? anomaly detection runs ? deviation triggers new Fact re-entering LiveOpsOS loop ? alert distributed
RTBI Planning Stream
Weekly: Digital Twin history extracted ? Forecasting models run ? capacity and demand projections updated ? scenario models refreshed ? Planning dashboard updated ? exceptions surfaced to human decision-makers
RTBI Decisions Stream
Continuous: Agentic Factory analyzes live Analytics and Planning data against Digital Twin history ? highest-probability-of-success action surfaced per situation ? recommendation delivered to responsible Persona ? human override logged
Specialist Genies
RTBI Anomaly Genie
Monitors the live Fact stream for statistical deviations from established patterns. When anomaly detected, generates a new Fact re-entering the LiveOpsOS loop, surfaces context to the relevant Persona, and recommends investigation or response.
RTBI Forecast Genie
Builds forward-looking projections from Digital Twin history. Answers: can we handle next month's volume? What will revenue be in 6 weeks? Which clients are at churn risk based on current patterns? Each projection traceable to source Facts.
RTBI Decisions Genie
Synthesises live Analytics, Planning projections, and Digital Twin history to surface prescriptive recommendations. Not describing what happened, not predicting what might - prescribing exactly what to do, with reasoning shown and human override always available.
?
Innovation Engine
How RTBI advances its intelligence capability

RTBI Innovation improves the intelligence layer itself - better anomaly detection models, more accurate forecasting, new planning scenarios, and expanding Decisions Genie capability. Every client's Digital Twin is a training ground: patterns that prove predictive in one deployment improve models across all deployments. The Innovation Engine also evaluates new AI capabilities (new model releases, new Microsoft Fabric features) for integration into the RTBI stack.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Innovation OS Product OS LEAN OS
Proprietary Streams
RTBI Model Improvement Stream
Monthly: evaluate forecast accuracy vs actuals across all active clients ? identify model drift ? retrain or recalibrate ? A/B test improved model ? deploy if validated ? accuracy metrics updated in Digital Twin
RTBI Capability Review Stream
Quarterly: review new Microsoft Fabric and AI model capabilities ? assess fit for RTBI stack ? proof-of-concept build in AI Studio ? evaluate ? adopt or park ? roadmap updated
Specialist Genies
RTBI Accuracy Genie
Compares forecast outputs against actual outcomes across all active RTBI clients. Identifies where models are drifting, which variables are losing predictive power, and which client contexts require model recalibration.
RTBI Research Genie
Monitors AI and analytics industry developments for techniques applicable to the RTBI stack - new anomaly detection approaches, time-series forecasting advances, causal inference methods - and surfaces candidates for AI Studio evaluation.
?
Logistics Engine
How RTBI manages its data infrastructure and platform operations

RTBI Logistics covers the operational infrastructure of the intelligence layer - Microsoft Fabric capacity management, Power BI workspace governance, Cosmos DB storage scaling, and the ongoing operational health of the Unified Data and Digital Twin components. Every capacity threshold, storage cost event, and platform health signal is a Fact. The Logistics Engine ensures the intelligence infrastructure scales with client Fact volume without surprising cost overruns.

Mini-OS this engine draws from
Admin OS Finance OS Operations OS
Proprietary Streams
RTBI Infrastructure Stream
Monthly: Fabric capacity utilisation reviewed ? storage costs vs budget ? Power BI workspace audit ? performance benchmarks ? scaling decisions made ? Finance OS updated with actual vs planned
RTBI Data Quality Stream
Continuous: Unified Data layer monitored for Fact completeness, latency, and schema consistency ? anomalies flagged ? source Mini-OS notified ? remediation tracked ? quality score updated
Specialist Genies
RTBI Infrastructure Genie
Monitors Microsoft Fabric capacity, Cosmos DB storage, and Power BI Premium utilisation across all active RTBI clients. Alerts when thresholds approach, models projected costs, and recommends scaling actions to maintain performance within budget.
RTBI Data Quality Genie
Continuously validates the Unified Data layer - checking for missing Facts, schema violations, latency spikes, and Digital Asset orphans. Surfaces data quality issues to the responsible Mini-OS team before they affect Analytics or Planning outputs.
groups.purpose: RTBI Growth converts operational clients into intelligence clients. The engine activates when a client already running MIP, LiveOps, or Intelligent Buildings has sufficient Fact volume to make RTBI meaningful - typically after 90 days of Fact accumulation. The commercial model is an intelligence layer add-on ($3-8k/month) that transforms operational data into board-level strategic visibility. The client stops asking 'what happened?' and starts asking 'what should we do next?'
groups.callout: Four engines, one pillar. Growth wins clients. Fulfillment delivers the promise. Innovation improves the product. Logistics keeps operations running. Every pillar runs all four - the engine type never changes, the application context does.
